chapters.title: Chapter 1: When Last Sounds
chapters.info: Avar Hachami, p. 110—One of Myrelle's four Warders. He also serves as a husband to her. He has a hawk-like nose and thick, gray-streaked mustaches. He was previously bonded to another sister, who was killed. He grew up in Saldaea. See also Berengari, Myrelle.
